item.title: How would i
item.dc:creator: @demon_fox337 demon fox337
item.description:
@demon_fox337 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=demon fox337 link=topic=485591.msg3558277#msg3558277 date=1302051032]
you could edit the interface with lins interface editor then use toms cache suite to replace the interface file in jagex archives i made it sound like more trouble then it is
[/quote]Lin’s Interface Editor doesn’t load hard-coded interfaces.[/quote]

mabe not but he could create an identical interface but without the lines XD it is more trouble tho =S just listen to vain

item.title: How would i
item.dc:creator: @poop_on_u234 poop on u234
item.description:
@poop_on_u234 wrote:

[code] public static void CruelalityxTab(RSFont[] TDA) {
RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(15051);
RSInterface scroll = addTabInterface(15052);
addText(15053, “RevelationX”, TDA, 2, 0xFF9900, false, true);
addSprite(15054, 0, “Interfaces/Achieve/ACH”);
addSprite(15055, 1, “Interfaces/Achieve/ACH”);
addSprite(15056, 0, “Interfaces/Achieve/ACH”);
tab.totalChildren(5);
tab.child(0, 15053, 5, 5);
tab.child(1, 15055, 0, 25);
tab.child(2, 15056, 0, 249);
tab.child(3, 15054, 0, 25);
tab.child(4, 15052, 0, 25);
scroll.width = 174; scroll.height = 224; scroll.scrollMax = 225;

    addText(15057, "Actions", TDA, 2, 0xFF9900, false, true);
	addHoverText(15058, "Request staff assistance", "Use", TDA, 0, 0xfa69ff, false, true, 150);
	addHoverText(15059, "Rules", "Use", TDA, 0, 0xfa69ff, false, true, 150);
	addSprite(15063, 2, "Interfaces/Achieve/ACH");
    /*addHoverText(15058, "Request staff assistance", "Use", TDA, 0, 0xfa69ff, 90, 11);
    addHoverText(15059, "Request a gamebook", "Use", TDA, 0, 0x06ff00, 90, 11);
    addHoverText(15060, "Staff teleport", "Use", TDA, 0, 0x0c9709, 90, 11);
    addHoverText(15061, "Donator teleport", "Use", TDA, 0, 0x06ff00, 90, 11);
	addHoverText(15062, "Empty", "Use", TDA, 0, 0x06ff00, 90, 11);   
	addSprite(15063, 2, "Achieve/ACH");   
    addText(15064, "Thank you for playing!", TDA, 2, 0xFF9900, false, true);*/
    scroll.totalChildren(8);
    scroll.child(0, 15057, 14, 11);
    scroll.child(1, 15058, 28, 33);
    scroll.child(2, 15059, 28, 47);
    scroll.child(3, 15060, 28, 61);
    scroll.child(4, 15061, 28, 75);
    scroll.child(5, 15062, 28, 89);
    scroll.child(6, 15063, 3, 110);
    scroll.child(7, 15064, 20, 209);
   }	[/code]

Sorry it took so long, I was grabbing a bite to eat.

Read full topic

item.title: How would i
item.dc:creator: @poop_on_u234 poop on u234
item.description:
@poop_on_u234 wrote:

public static void questTab(RSFont[] TDA){ RSInterface Interface = addInterface(638); setChildren(4, Interface); addText(29155, "Quests", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addButton(29156, 2, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST", 18, 18, "Swap to Pk Supplies", 1); addSprite(29157, 0, "Interfaces/QuestTab/QUEST"); setBounds(29155, 10, 5, 0, Interface); setBounds(29156, 165, 5, 1, Interface); setBounds(29157, 3, 24, 2, Interface); setBounds(29160, 5, 29, 3, Interface); Interface = addInterface(29160); Interface.height = 214; Interface.width = 165; Interface.scrollMax = 1700; Interface.newScroller = false; setChildren(105, Interface); addText(29161, "Save Your Account! :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29162, "Click Here To Save", "Save", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addText(29163, "Register on :", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29164, "", "Register", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addText(663, "Player Info:", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addHoverText(26166, "", "Register", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); setBounds(29161, 4, 4, 0, Interface); setBounds(29162, 8, 22, 1, Interface); setBounds(29163, 4, 35, 2, Interface); setBounds(29164, 8, 53, 3, Interface); setBounds(663, 4, 67, 4, Interface); int Ypos = 83; int frameID = 5; for(int iD = 29165; iD <= 29264;iD++){ addHoverText(iD, "", "View Quest"/*"View Quest Journal, "+iD*/, TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); setBounds(iD, 8, Ypos, frameID, Interface); frameID++; Ypos += 15; Ypos++; }

I don’t know if thats what you wanted but it was my best guess.

Read full topic
